tool_description: Tracks and retrieves current status of transactions throughout the payment processing lifecycle.

include_history.description: Whether to include full status change history

error_messages: Transaction not found: No transaction exists with the provided transaction ID.
Invalid transaction ID format: Transaction ID must be a valid non-empty string.
Status tracking unavailable: Transaction status tracking is temporarily unavailable.
usage: Provide the transaction_id to track. Set include_history to true if you need complete status change history rather than just current status.

status_history.description: Full status change history if requested

next_expected_status.description: Expected next status in the workflow
